mapper.sql: DPD_ID, DPD_DP_ID, DPD_CM_ID, DPD_CM_NAME, DPD_DIALTEL, DPD_U_ID, DPD_AGENTID, DPD_AGENTNAME, DPD_AGENTPARTMENT, DPD_DIALSTATE, DPD_DIALSTATESTR, DPD_DIALSTARTTIME, DPD_DIALENDTIME, DPD_RECORDFILE, DPD_TALKLENGTH, DPD_OFFICIALLENGTH, DPD_NEXTCALLTIME, DPD_CALLRESULT, DPD_SUMMARY, DPD_DIALTIMES, DPD_STRING1, DPD_STRING2, DPD_STRING3, DPD_STRING4, DPD_STRING5, DPD_STRING6, DPD_STRING7, DPD_STRING8, DPD_STRING9, DPD_STRING10, DPD_NUMBER1, DPD_NUMBER2, DPD_NUMBER3, DPD_NUMBER4, DPD_NUMBER5, DPD_NUMBER6, DPD_DATE1, DPD_DATE2, DPD_DATE3, DPD_DATE4, DPD_DATE5, DPD_COMMENT1, DPD_COMMENT2, DPD_COMMENT3, DPD_COMMENT4, DPD_COMMENT5, DPD_CREATEDATE, DPD_ACTSTATE, DPD_ACT_U_ID, DPD_ACTDATE, DPD_AUDITSTATE, DPD_GID, DPD_BATCH, DPD_ALLOCDATE, DPD_ALLOCDAYNUM, DPD_AUDITSTATESTR, DPD_QR_ID, DPD_Q_ID, DPD_CT_ID,
mapper.select: SELECT DPD_ID as "Id" , DPD_DP_ID as "dpdDpId" , DPD_CM_ID as "dpdCmId" , DPD_CM_NAME as "dpdCmName" , DPD_DIALTEL as "dpdDialtel" , DPD_U_ID as "dpdUId" , DPD_AGENTID as "dpdAgentid" , DPD_AGENTNAME as "dpdAgentname" , DPD_AGENTPARTMENT as "dpdAgentpartment" , DPD_DIALSTATE as "dpdDialstate" , DPD_DIALSTATESTR as "dpdDialstatestr" , DPD_DIALSTARTTIME as "dpdDialstarttime" , DPD_DIALENDTIME as "dpdDialendtime" , DPD_RECORDFILE as "dpdRecordfile" , DPD_TALKLENGTH as "dpdTalklength" , DPD_OFFICIALLENGTH as "dpdOfficiallength" , DPD_NEXTCALLTIME as "dpdNextcalltime" , DPD_CALLRESULT as "dpdCallresult" , DPD_SUMMARY as "dpdSummary" , DPD_DIALTIMES as "dpdDialtimes" , DPD_STRING1 as "dpdString1" , DPD_STRING2 as "dpdString2" , DPD_STRING3 as "dpdString3" , DPD_STRING4 as "dpdString4" , DPD_STRING5 as "dpdString5" , DPD_STRING6 as "dpdString6" , DPD_STRING7 as "dpdString7" , DPD_STRING8 as "dpdString8" , DPD_STRING9 as "dpdString9" , DPD_STRING10 as "dpdString10" , DPD_NUMBER1 as "dpdNumber1" , DPD_NUMBER2 as "dpdNumber2" , DPD_NUMBER3 as "dpdNumber3" , DPD_NUMBER4 as "dpdNumber4" , DPD_NUMBER5 as "dpdNumber5" , DPD_NUMBER6 as "dpdNumber6" , DPD_DATE1 as "dpdDate1" , DPD_DATE2 as "dpdDate2" , DPD_DATE3 as "dpdDate3" , DPD_DATE4 as "dpdDate4" , DPD_DATE5 as "dpdDate5" , DPD_COMMENT1 as "dpdComment1" , DPD_COMMENT2 as "dpdComment2" , DPD_COMMENT3 as "dpdComment3" , DPD_COMMENT4 as "dpdComment4" , DPD_COMMENT5 as "dpdComment5" , DPD_CREATEDATE as "dpdCreatedate" , DPD_ACTSTATE as "dpdActstate" , DPD_ACT_U_ID as "dpdActUId" , DPD_ACTDATE as "dpdActdate" , DPD_AUDITSTATE as "dpdAuditstate" , DPD_GID as "dpdGid" , DPD_BATCH as "dpdBatch" , DPD_ALLOCDATE as "dpdAllocdate" , DPD_ALLOCDAYNUM as "dpdAllocdaynum" , DPD_AUDITSTATESTR as "dpdAuditstatestr" , DPD_QR_ID as "dpdQrId" , DPD_Q_ID as "dpdQId" , DPD_CT_ID as "dpdCtId" FROM NAG_DATAPOOLDATA WHERE DPD_ID=#{Id}
SELECT Auto_increment FROM information_schema.`TABLES` WHERE Table_Schema='${dbName}' AND table_name = 'NAG_DATAPOOLDATA'
